name: Pentis (itch) (Grapefruit 256)
description:
Pentis is entertainly playable and uses a nearly similar game engine as Tetris, but instead of tetrominoes(4), pentominoes(5) are falling from the top of the screen. Those five-block shapes offer a more complex and advanced level of gameplay.

Pentis is in developement, but playable. And fun. And free ! 

Any kind of feedback is extremly welcome! :)

Additionally three player comments from the last weeks:

"I'm still playing it - I don't want to die !!!"

"I'm playing it every day - And I'm getting better :)"

"The music is cool - different from what I expect from those kind of games"

Soundtrack by fensteroffen available on bandcamp. This is a link to the gametrack:

https://fensteroffen.bandcamp.com/track/k-nigstropfen

By the way: He is generally  interested in publishing his music in games !   ;)
